original_text: Moreover four thousand were porters; and four thousand praised the Lord with the instruments which I made, said David, to praise therewith.
korean_text: 사천 명은 문지기요 사천 명은 그가 여호와께 찬송을 드리기 위하여 만든 악기로 찬송하는 자들이라

sentences.original_text: and four thousand praised the Lord
with the instruments which I made, said David,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 만든 악기로 찬송하기 위해, 다윗이 말하니
